sentences.sContent: He was pursuing a utopian dream of world prosperity.
sentences.sCn: 他那时在追求一个不切实际的世界繁荣之梦。

synos.tran: 乌托邦的；空想的；理想化的

phrases.pCn: 空想社会主义；乌托邦社会主义

words.tran: 空想的社会改良方案；乌托邦思想

trans.tranOther: If you describe a plan or idea as utopian, you are criticizing it because it is unrealistic and shows a belief that things can be improved much more than is possible
